name: isle-editor
description: Editor for Integrated Statistics Learning Environment (ISLE) lessons.

scripts.build-dll: cross-env node ./scripts/bump_dll_version.js && node ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack --mode=production --config webpack.config.dll.js --progress --color && node ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack --mode=production --config webpack.config.workers.js
scripts.package: npm run build && electron-builder build --publish never
